charges.charge_description: 18:1001(a)(2) and (3) FALSE STATEMENTS TO A FEDERAL AGENCY (1)

charges.charge_disposition: THE DEFT IS HEREBY COMMITTED TO THE CUSTODY OF THE US BUREAU OF PRISONS TO BE IMPRISONED FOR A TERM OF 10 MONTHS AT COUNTS 1,2,3 &; 4. ALL TERMS TO RUN CONCURRENTLY. UPON RELEASE FROM IMPRISONMENT, THE DEFT SHALL BE ON SUPERVISED RELEASE FOR A TERM OF 3 YEARS AT COUNTS 1,2,3 &; 4. ALL TERMS TO RUN CONCURRENTLY, WITH STANDARD CONDITIONS OF SUPERVISION AND ADDITIONAL CONDITIONS AS STATED MORE FULLY IN ORDER. THE DEFT SHALL MAKE RESTITUTION, JOINTLY AND SEVERALLY, TO THE FOLLOWING PERSONS IN THE FOLL OWING AMOUNTS: CITICORP, 14700 CITICORP DRIVE, HAGERSTOWN, MD 21742 ATTN: CLAUDETTE MOSER IN THE AMOUNT OF $11,928.27, CHASE MANHATTAN BANK, 100 DUFFY AVENUE, HICKSVILLE, NY 11801 ATTN: CAROL MUELLERS IN THE AMOUNT OF $2,858.43, NEXT BANK, P.O. BOX 311, LIVERMORE, CA 94551, ATTN: DENISE REBAR IN THE AMOUNT OF $5,975.01, FLEET BANK, 201 GIBRALTER, HORSHAM, PA 19044, ATTN: PAMELA STRENK IN THE AMOUNT OF $4,303.55, AMERICAN EXPRESS, 6712 WASHINGTON AVE., SUITE 210, EGG HARBOR, N J 08324, ATTN: JOHN GOLBRESKI IN THE AMOUNT OF $16,271.80, DISCOVER, 12 READ'S WAY, NEW CASTLE, DE 19720, ATTN: WILLIAM HAYNAN IN THE AMOUNT OF $14,684.12, FIRST UNION BANK, 401 MARKET STREET, PHILADELPHIA, PA 19106, ATTN: MICHAEL O&;#0 39;NEILL IN THE AMOUNT OF $16,288.24 AND ALLEGHENY VALLEY BANK, 5137 BUTLER STREET, PITTSBURGH, PA 15201, ATTN: MARY LOUI RIES IN THE AMOUNT OF $9,509.21. THE COURT HAS DETERMINED THAT THE DEFT DOES NOT HAVE THE ABILITY TO PAY INTEREST. THE REFORE, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT THE INTEREST REQUIREMENT IS WAIVED. IT IS ORDERED THAT THE DEFT SHALL PAY TO THE UNITED STATES A SPECIAL ASSESSMENT OF $400.00 WHICH SHALL BE DUE IMMEDIATELY.
